biography_text: HURD, William Ballard, a Representative from Texas; born in San Antonio, Bexar County, Tex., August 19, 1977; graduated from John Marshall High School, San Antonio, Tex., 1995; B.S., Texas A&M University, College Station, Tex., 2000; business owner; operations officer, Central Intelligence Agency, 2000-2009; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2015-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: Texas A&M University, College Station, Tex.
